lenders.name: Katalin I.
lenders.loan_because: I can.

lenders.name: Rachel
lenders.loan_because: I want to help

lenders.name: Alan

lenders.occupational_info: I work in electronics in a physics research lab.

lenders.name: Jennifer
lenders.loan_because: I can.  Because it is just my way of life.
lenders.occupational_info: I am working on my degree so I can practice international human rights law.  I work with refugee issues, genocide and war crimes.

lenders.name: Caroline

lenders.occupational_info: I teach world studies to 9th graders.

lenders.name: Ryan Ribary
lenders.loan_because: it helps people:)
lenders.occupational_info: My family and I care about the other wonderful people around our planet and feel that helping has to start somewhere... why not with you?

lenders.name: Glenn
lenders.loan_because: I believe in karma.

lenders.name: Dave
lenders.occupational_info: I work with at-risk teens at a residential treatment facility in Longmont, CO

lenders.name: Julie
lenders.loan_because: I am grateful for what I have

lenders.name: Jeff & Pauline
lenders.loan_because: We want to help those who help themselves.

lenders.name: Tracy
lenders.loan_because: we are here on earth to help one another.
lenders.occupational_info: I work with people struggling with Addiction.

lenders.name: Harriet
lenders.loan_because: Micro loans intrigue me because they offer a real possibility out of extreme poverty.

lenders.name: Mo W.
lenders.loan_because: I believe we all share a collective responsibility for each other. Kiva is the perfect way to practice that responsibility.
lenders.occupational_info: Although I am retired I serve on a number of volunteer boards in the USA as well as South Africa, all of which I find enormously satisfying.

lenders.name: Sharon
lenders.loan_because: I want to help people especially those who want to work hard and help themselves, family & community.
lenders.occupational_info: I design and create jewelry.

lenders.name: Brian
lenders.loan_because: I was introduced to Kiva by a gift from my sister-in-law Sarah. This seems like a great way to make a little difference in the world - in places that are not all that easy to reach.
lenders.occupational_info: I manage computer software related projects for a health insurance company.

lenders.name: Bob
lenders.loan_because:
I've had the privilege and honor to live and work in the  USA, Europe and Asia.

All of our six children have lived outside the USA. One of our two grandchildren recently completed a study program outside the USA.

We believe that our travel experiences help us to be better global citizens.
lenders.occupational_info:
Online Travel Agent ----

For all your travel  needs ----
www.115besttravelbargains.com

For Great Golf ---- www.115bestgolfvacations.com

You can be a successful travel agent ---- www.115besttravelbargains.info



You can call me on SKYPE ----
(760) 536-4342

lenders.name: Molly
lenders.loan_because: I want to do my tiny part of leaving this big world a better place for my daughter and inspire her to do the same.

lenders.name: Giovanni
lenders.loan_because: "If you lend money to one of my people among you who is needy, do not be like a moneylender; charge him no interest.” Exodus 22,25

lenders.name: Michael
lenders.loan_because: I want to decrease world suck.
lenders.occupational_info: Removing operational overhead.

lenders.name: Michael
lenders.loan_because: Helping people. It is the right thing to do.
lenders.occupational_info: I manage the aviation component of one of Canada's provincial air ambulance and Critical Care Transport Programs.

lenders.name: Nic
lenders.loan_because: Economic opportunity should not be determined by location.

lenders.name: Cooper
lenders.loan_because: people can have a sense of ownership over their work.
lenders.occupational_info: Communicating between computer people and business people.

lenders.name: Matthew
lenders.loan_because: I have been blessed and want to share my good fortune.
lenders.occupational_info: I run a sports recruiting website designed to help athletes in US gain athletic exposure to 4 year college coaches.

lenders.name: Yael M
lenders.loan_because: I believe that everyone should have a fair chance at making a living. This organization is founded on such a beautiful idea.. I only hope for more generous people in this world!
lenders.occupational_info: I'm an elementary school teacher.. changing the world one student at a time!

lenders.name: Marianne & Kemp
lenders.loan_because: We're inspired by the courage and strength of the people of Africa, and we want to help.

lenders.name: Jennifer
lenders.loan_because: I can.

lenders.name: Dylan
lenders.loan_because: I am blessed and want to "Pass it On"

lenders.name: Chuck
lenders.loan_because: A rising tide lifts all boats.

lenders.name: Jackson
lenders.loan_because: I care
lenders.occupational_info: I work in ideas and influence.

lenders.name: Leslie
lenders.loan_because: I believe in paying forward the blessings one has revceived in life.

lenders.name: Steve and Cathy
lenders.loan_because: We believe that we can make a difference with microloans.
lenders.occupational_info: We both volunteer in the Peace Corps. We work in the Health Sector.

lenders.name: Boudewijn
lenders.loan_because: I believe in entrepreneurs
lenders.occupational_info: Entrepreneurial for the better

lenders.name: Zachary & Rebecca
lenders.loan_because: I want to hear about the beautiful communities my neighbors are building.
lenders.occupational_info: Zach is the director of a project committed to helping individuals and families reach sustainable living in South Dakota, USA.  Rebecca teaches children reading and math.

lenders.name: Nikolett
lenders.loan_because: to be able to help someone change or improve their life is an amazing gift...
lenders.occupational_info: I teach individuals how to enhance their external beauty to match or compliment their inner spirit thus giving them more confidence.   My job is a gift in itself.  Regardless of who my client may be, my main mission is to make them happy, and see themselves in a more positive light.

lenders.name: Dolly (Sylvia)
lenders.loan_because: I like this concept, and just want to  make a difference.

lenders.name: Victoria
lenders.loan_because: I will be withdrawing my Kiva funds due to their field partners' funding of blood sports such as cock fighting.
lenders.occupational_info: I use a reading intervention system to improve the abilities of low-level readers at the Durango Adult Education Center

lenders.name: Tiffany & Jeff
lenders.loan_because: My Husband and I loan because this is a great tool to improve conditions in the rest of the world.
lenders.occupational_info: I am in sales for a Lonza.  A contract manufacturer to the Pharmaceutical/Biotech industry

lenders.name: Tim
lenders.loan_because: I started my own business and everyone needs help starting a business.
lenders.occupational_info: I help small businesses improve their cash flow.

lenders.name: Kerry
lenders.loan_because: I'd like to give others a shot at achieving their goals
lenders.occupational_info: I help manage projects for a large company

lenders.name: Juli
lenders.loan_because: everyone deserves a chance.

lenders.name: Kevin Hewitt
lenders.loan_because: I have been very lucky  to have people who care about me and I want to share that experience with others.
lenders.occupational_info: I take pictures .... love what I do!

lenders.name: Nimali Gamage
lenders.loan_because: I received a Kiva gift certificate from my sister in 2007 and have enjoyed loaning and reloaning the same $75 over the years to various individuals all over the world and watching their businesses and situations grow and improve!
lenders.occupational_info: I am a lawyer in Toronto, Canada, specializing in elder law, disability legal issues, wills, trusts, and estates.

lenders.name: Daniel
lenders.loan_because: We are all connected!  Although I live within modest means by American standards, I feel fortunate to be able to assist in support ing others to define and reach their full potential.
lenders.occupational_info: I am also a new entrepreneur; providing full service travel arrangements to individuals and businesses in underserved communities.

lenders.name: James
lenders.loan_because: I believe in the principle of helping others help themselves.
lenders.occupational_info: I help businesses run better, faster and more profitably by improving their computer software.

lenders.name: Connor, Isaac, Eliza
lenders.loan_because: We are nuts about our Grammy!!! We wanted to give a gift in our Grammy's name (Sharon) to help this woman with her business.

lenders.name: Michael
lenders.loan_because: I can.
lenders.occupational_info: I use a computer to design machinery for steel plants and the transportation industries.

lenders.name: Karma and Brad
lenders.loan_because: We loan because we are a small part of a larger global community. We believe that it is our role as a community member is to share what we have. Not only does that help individuals, but strengthen the community as a whole and foster good will among all of us.
lenders.occupational_info:
Karma= Emergency Manager. Plans for, prevents, reponds to, and helps her community recover from disasters and large emergencies. 
Brad= Construction. Builds and repairs fuel and auto repair stations.

lenders.name: Chase
lenders.loan_because: every one needs help at one point in time I loan to people hoping that some day they will loan to another person for a continuous circle of help
lenders.occupational_info: its usauly a bad day at the office.More 9-5

lenders.name: Lynn
lenders.loan_because: It is so very exciting to be a part of someone's dream. Thank you Kiva for the opportunities and all you do!

lenders.name: Ebon
lenders.loan_because: I should.
lenders.occupational_info: I study fine art photography at RMIT university. My photographs can be viewed at my website.

lenders.name: Blake
lenders.loan_because: I know what it feels like to work for years and feel like you will never get ahead. If I can help someone out, I feel very fortunate.

lenders.name: Bill
lenders.loan_because: I would like to help people who have a realistic plan and need a loan to make the plan work.
lenders.occupational_info: I am retired and live on a sailboat.  I used to be a lawyer and a partner in small real estate projects.

lenders.name: Nash
lenders.loan_because: as an engineering student who's a year behind in his schooling, I don't have time to make the world a better place any other way!
lenders.occupational_info: I'm going to school to become an electrical engineer. I'm hoping to get a job in the audio electronics industry after I graduate. I love music, so I want to find new ways to bring it to people everywhere!

lenders.name: Natalia
lenders.loan_because: It feels good to give back.

lenders.name: Syrenitee
lenders.loan_because: I loan because I care. I also loan because I want to change lives!!!
lenders.occupational_info: I climbed Whiteface Mountain in Lake Placid all the way to the top and all the way down!

lenders.name: Ekstrom Family
lenders.loan_because: We believe in helping others; we believe in the power of microloans. Everyone deserves the chance to succeed.
lenders.occupational_info: Hanna provides in-home medical care for dogs and cats in the Greater Seattle Area. Hakan is an international forestry consultant.

lenders.name: Tiffany
lenders.loan_because: I first heard about this program in a college business class and am happy to now be a part of it.  I think it is a great way to help those who just need a little assistance to support their families and contribute to their communities.

lenders.name: Rebecca
lenders.loan_because: I feel I can make such a big difference to another, with such a small gift.
lenders.occupational_info: I help people find a way forward for their business, supporting their business and communication planning.

lenders.name: Jessica
lenders.occupation: quality assurance for social welfare programs
lenders.loan_because: It helps me remember we all live on the same planet
lenders.occupational_info: I review food stamps, medicaid and cash assistance progams for accuracy.

lenders.name: Seal Pool
lenders.loan_because: I don't believe in the free market.

lenders.name: Joe
lenders.loan_because: It amazes me that the same entrepreneurial spirit lives around the world.
lenders.occupational_info: Its a people business, much like many others.

lenders.name: Lesley
lenders.loan_because: everyone deserves a chance.

lenders.name: Mary & Dave
lenders.loan_because: It is an effort to share some of the many advantages I was born into.

lenders.name: mary anne
lenders.loan_because: The need is so great and it expands my little world.

lenders.name: Brian
lenders.loan_because: Micro-lending provides unbanked entrepreneurs with much more than a simple, one-time influx of cash; it helps them build a reputation and, over time, wealth for themselves, their families and their communities.

lenders.name: bahman
lenders.loan_because: everyone should pay it forward.
lenders.occupational_info: I design tall buildings.

lenders.name: Linda
lenders.loan_because: I'd like to share some of my good fortune with those striving for a better life.

lenders.name: Christopher
lenders.loan_because: I think that microlending is incredible.  I read Yunus' book "Banker to the Poor" and it changed my thinking regarding the poor.  My ultimate plan is to move to Kenya and work through a microlending institution there.
lenders.occupational_info: I am a bank branch manager.

lenders.name: Aileen
lenders.loan_because: I want to make a difference.

lenders.name: Ingrid
lenders.occupational_info: I am pursuing a PhD in Neuroscience.  I study the brain and the diseases of the brain.  My work primarily focuses on finding ways to treat Epilepsy

lenders.name: Pamela
lenders.loan_because: This is a small, easily do-able, direct way of sharing my resources to help someone else build her own life up. It's easy, low-risk, and is helping someone to fish, rather than tossing a pre-made meal her way.
lenders.occupational_info: Mostly I raise my five kids. Occasionally I write, and even more occasionally, I get paid for what I write.

lenders.name: Pat
lenders.loan_because: eveyone needs help sometime

lenders.name: Mike
lenders.loan_because: I think it's a genius concept. I love to support people who are following their dreams. And since it's a loan, it's like recycling money!
lenders.occupational_info: Most of the time, I write advertising copy for marketing campaigns. I'm also a part-time photographer with a few scattered shows around Cincinnati.

lenders.name: Alison
lenders.loan_because: I would like to help someone make a living for themselves.

lenders.name: Mari
lenders.occupational_info: I am in graduate school at Duke University, preparing to become a professor of sociology.

lenders.name: Liane
lenders.loan_because: I simply want to help others make this a better world.

lenders.name: Mila
lenders.loan_because: I was a small business owner back in my native country - Russia  and  understand the challenges    a woman meets, particularly in  developing countries,  on the way from survivalship to become a  successful entrepreneur. I know  that what seems a small amount  to me , can be a life changing  opportunity for those  who are less fortunate .
lenders.occupational_info: As a professional  I help people to make a right decision  while  buying or selling real estate. My personal moto is: "I shall pass through this world but once, any good that I can do, or any kindness that I can show any human being, let me do it now, and not defer it. For I shall not pass this way again." - Stephen Geller

lenders.name: Barb
lenders.loan_because: I want to reach out and help others improve their lives.  Sharing our blessings to make a better world is a wonderful way to put Jesus'  teaching to "love our neighbors" into practice.

lenders.name: Jess
lenders.loan_because: I understand the concept of budgeting and how a little really can go a long way.
lenders.occupational_info: I am a graduate student working in the field of environmental biology.

lenders.name: Avis
lenders.loan_because: I appreciate the opportunity to help someone improve their life. Kiva provides an awesome opportunity to touch lives around the world. My dad had his own business and so I appreciate the challenges faced by the small business person. I can only imagine how much harder those challenges are in othr parts of the world.
lenders.occupational_info: I work at a large university and provide advice to students to help them select courses, majors and other academic opportunities on campus.

lenders.name: craig
lenders.loan_because:
sometimes all you need is a little help to go so much further then where you are .
I am just returning the favor to others
lenders.occupational_info: research and development of thin film coating in vacum chambers' five years new to me '

lenders.name: Teague
lenders.loan_because: My family wants me to learn to have compassion and be globally conscious.
lenders.occupational_info: Eat, sleep, play

lenders.name: John
lenders.loan_because: I contribute to Kiva loans to help build a world of compassion and peace.  The Kiva system allows my dollars to stay in circulation thus multiplying the power of its contribution to a new world.
lenders.occupational_info: My day job is that of a software engineer and I have written and assisted in writing programs that helps to identify people, or to help find lost things.   I am also an artist.  I call my art "spiritual abstractions", these are painting that strive to show us all that we are more then we appear to be.

lenders.name: Ulf
lenders.loan_because: I find the stories amazing and make me really understand how fortunate I am to be able to make a difference for someone who really needs and deserve it.

lenders.name: Keith
lenders.loan_because: Every person can make a difference

lenders.name: Matthew
lenders.loan_because: I loan gifts in the name of Jesus Christ.
lenders.occupational_info: I'm looking to graduate from college with a degree in special education.

lenders.name: Brian
lenders.loan_because: Everyone deserves the opportunity to achieve their dreams.

lenders.name: Jackie
lenders.loan_because: it is a way for me to connect with people around the world & help them with their businesses in a more personal manner.  Additionally it is a way for me to share in what God has blessed me with in my life to others in need.
lenders.occupational_info: I work for a company that makes baked goods - bread, rolls, cakes, pies, crackers, etc. and I help them to reduce their impact on the environment.

lenders.name: Bonnie
lenders.loan_because: i like to contribute to other people's success, like people have contributed to mine :)
lenders.occupational_info: helping people access, share, and create knowledge, information, and cultural objects

lenders.name: michele
lenders.loan_because:
Unless we practice loving feelings toward everyone we meet, day in, day out, we're missing out on the most joyous part of life. If we can actually open our hearts, there's no difficulty in being happy.

-Ayya Khema, "Be an Island"

lenders.name: Tim
lenders.loan_because: I want to help individuals who are trying to support their families.

lenders.name: hayata
lenders.loan_because: something I can do for helping.

lenders.name: Alice
lenders.loan_because: KIVA rocks!!!

lenders.name: Sarah
lenders.loan_because: I have more than most people in the world, and can give knowing my money is benefitting others that have less than I do.

lenders.name: johanne
lenders.loan_because: i want to end poverty.
lenders.occupational_info: Project management and team leader.

lenders.name: Caroline
lenders.loan_because: I want to make a difference.

lenders.name: Sophie
lenders.loan_because: Sophie received a Kiva gift certificate for her 5th birthday.  Sophie, 5 Y.O:  "To be nice. So people can be happy."

lenders.name: Michael
lenders.loan_because: "You can't lead anyone else further than you have gone yourself"
lenders.occupational_info: I am a student

lenders.name: Greg and Carrie
lenders.loan_because: I care about the people in the developing world, and I want to see nations transformed by alleviating poverty with loans that jumpstart small business.
lenders.occupational_info: Helping US companies sell more product online through online marketing.

lenders.name: Arif I
lenders.loan_because: I experienced poverty as a child and always have and will continue to preach small business as a way out of poverty. My father was bedridden when I was five and passed away when I was ten. I have utmost admiration for my Mum who raised 6 children with bare minimum, plucking things out of nature,with out a job or a small business.
lenders.occupational_info:
I am a small business owner and small business not only is a great way out of poverty and a means of success and independence. It is gratifying to see ones direct input and the resulting output. 
Anyone can have a job. It takes a real man or woman to take the initiative to start and run  a business successfully.

lenders.name: Dawn
lenders.loan_because: I love that this site enables my help to directly reach REAL PEOPLE and impact their lives directly.  Fantastic idea.

lenders.name: David
lenders.loan_because: It is for a worthy cause and is a great concept.
lenders.occupational_info: I provide benefits for people that  helps protect their income.

lenders.name: Marie
lenders.loan_because: I care about other people in the world.

lenders.name: Sandy
lenders.loan_because: it's a helping hand.

lenders.name: Alison
lenders.occupational_info: I administer the staff and students in a music school.

lenders.name: Galena Alyson Canada
lenders.loan_because: Kiva manifests the potential of the internet in the very best way.
lenders.occupational_info: American born, raised there and abroad, Lena makes her home in a rural Maya village in Central America, with working trips to the Pacific Northwest.

lenders.name: Stephanie
lenders.loan_because: I have seen first hand the impact microfinance makes. I believe in the power of attempt...and this is exactly what these entrepreneurs are doing...attempting...
lenders.occupational_info: I help people in developing countries and people recovering from disasters rebuild and start over in small steps.

lenders.name: Valerie
lenders.loan_because: I made a New Year's resolution to be a better citizen of the world. It's an honor to be able to provide a loan to someone who is working so hard to improve their life and the welfare of their community.
lenders.occupational_info: I work to help people in my community have better access to public transportation. With better transit, the quality of their lives can improve.

lenders.name: VANESSA
lenders.loan_because: I hope that I can make a small difference in someone's life.

lenders.name: Dave & Sarah
lenders.loan_because: Every little helps...
lenders.occupational_info: Dave works in an office and Sarah is a counsellor.

lenders.name: Valerie
lenders.loan_because: I'd like to start giving back, now that I'm starting to earn my own money.  I have been so fortunate - growing up in the States, pursuing an engineering degree, being able to travel and study abroad.  I believe strongly in the effectiveness of microfinance and the impact of no-interest loans for entrepreneurs.
lenders.occupational_info: I'm currently studying Industrial Engineering.  This major focuses on the big picture - people, processes, and systems - and how to make it more efficient and productive.

lenders.name: April
lenders.loan_because: I feel so blessed to be employed.  This is such a simple way to share that feeling.
lenders.occupational_info: I design buildings and see them through construction.

lenders.name: Monica
lenders.loan_because: I believe in lifting as I climb.
lenders.occupational_info: I support and manage federal grants.

lenders.name: Joshua
lenders.loan_because: It is the right thing to do...
lenders.occupational_info: I am an Air Traffic Controller (I keep airplanes from touching during flight), I get to do this is the best city in the world, Seattle WA and I have the best wife I could have asked for. Karma is amazing and I did something right to get this lucky!!

lenders.name: L&L
lenders.loan_because: Poverty is solved by free agency, hard work, accountability, and uncompelled charity, never government.

lenders.name: The Wrightees
lenders.loan_because: A lot of people helped us out a little bit here and there, we know it works.

lenders.name: CrankyMax
lenders.loan_because:
It gives people a start, the rest is up to them.
It improves the community, rather than bypassing it.
lenders.occupational_info: I organize information in computers

lenders.name: ROCCO
lenders.loan_because: I love helping others, I am strong believer in ”consumer economics,” yet we humans, now more than ever, must be responsible in how our consumption is affecting the earth itself and all other life forms here,  I have worked in many capacities in business, and now to become a lender in business is another experience for me to have.
lenders.occupational_info: My work is routine and huge in paper-work. I would say to anyone who is doing business accross the world that one would be surprised of the similarities, yet take your largest risks in the things you love the most and just go with your gut instincts.

lenders.name: Mike
lenders.loan_because: It is the right thing to do.
lenders.occupational_info: I teach college and write and do photography.  I love it all.

lenders.name: Yvonne
lenders.loan_because: I think that it is better to help people in there own country than to give money to goverments

lenders.name: Mauro
lenders.loan_because: I believe that if the things goes better in the rest of the world it's good for me and my family too...
lenders.occupational_info: Usually i work around website portal of my company

lenders.name: Andrea
lenders.loan_because: It costs nothing and make poverty a bit more far from people.
lenders.occupational_info: Archiving and managing digital contents for an italian editorial group.

lenders.name: Serge
lenders.loan_because: I hope that micro lending enables people to work their way out of poverty for them, their family and community
lenders.occupational_info: show the creative and operational people in the company I work for how the company / products are doing

lenders.name: Paolo
lenders.loan_because: Con il microcredito possiamo aiutare milioni di persone in tutto il mondo.

lenders.name: cedric
lenders.loan_because: I think this is a fair redistribution of ressources !
lenders.occupational_info: Enterprise Architect in an energy company

lenders.name: The Valdys
lenders.loan_because: I like the idea of people working smart and hard to better themselves and I always believe in giving then you shall receive.
lenders.occupational_info: I help organisation to create better computer software.

lenders.name: RINALDI
lenders.loan_because:
I believe in mankind
I believe in a better world
lenders.occupational_info: borring lol

lenders.name: ABDUL
lenders.loan_because: i want to loan because i want to expand my business as i think i now have the potential to expand the business after doing it for some time now.
lenders.occupational_info: in northern sierra leone,motor bike rental has been the main source of movement from one point to the other within a limited time and it would take you to the most remote side of the country side where a vehicle will never dream of going. so as such i purchase motor bikes and give it ton a rider who inturn will pay me at the end of the day,weeek or month depending on our agreement. this form of trade has created a huge employment for young people in not only my region, but other part of the country.

lenders.name: Susan
lenders.loan_because: thanks to Kiva, I no longer feel powerless to make a difference.

lenders.name: Danny& Selena
lenders.loan_because: It takes a village to raise a child.
lenders.occupational_info:
I am in the service industry.
Iclean other buisness after they close for the day .All my work is done through the night hours.

lenders.name: Deb E.
lenders.loan_because: It was very easy progam to get involved with to help others. To be a small part in somthing that will have a much bigger impact on someone else. I recently took my children to see a movie. The cost for tickets, popcorn and a drink was almost $50! How many other people could have put that to better use?
lenders.occupational_info: Parent first, we live on a small organic farm, We do not use herbicides or pesticides, which means more work but the benefits sure taste better and we are leaving our farm a better place for the future. We also keep 10 hives of honeybees and know they have a good place to work.

lenders.name: Bill and Mary
lenders.loan_because: I have a loving son who has inspired me with a gift to share. I want to invest this gift with the free spirit of individual enterprise.
lenders.occupational_info: I have had the privilege of many career pursuits. Not by choice, mind you. I have served as a soldier, operated my own dairy farm, delivered mail as a postal carrier, repaired aircraft for a major airline, and now test the operation of large trucks or semi tractors.

lenders.name: Giles
lenders.loan_because: I give to charity, but think it is important that I should help individuals to build their own businesses.
lenders.occupational_info: I am a barrister (a lawyer) in Bradford in Britain.  I specialise in criminal law.  I prosecute and defend.  I am self employed.

lenders.name: shahida
lenders.loan_because: This is one way to have a direct link with people who are transforming their lives, the lives of their children and their community.  I like knowing that the money is going to those who want to be more self sufficent.  For me this is about PEACE.  Peace in the heart and in the mind.  Peace that comes from knowing that you can feed your children.  Peace comes when your children can go to school. Peace when you are being productive in your life.  Peace comes from autonomy and community.  Peace comes when everyone in the home has food and in their bellies and can get a good nights' sleep.  Peace comes when the home is happy and basic needs are met.  Peace comes when one feels a growing sense of self respect, dignity and accomplishment.  Peace comes from knowing that somewhere out in this big world of ours, there are people whom we will never meet,  that care about the existence of others from the far flung corners of the world.
lenders.occupational_info: I am a massage therapist and work with clients to relieve chronic pain and to bring peacefulness and healing to the world, one person at a time.

lenders.name: Beth
lenders.occupational_info: Artist, nature & cultural enthusiast.

lenders.name: Susan
lenders.loan_because: in helping another of God's children, I'm thanking God for the help he has given me.
lenders.occupational_info: I take a tithe (10%) of my disability income to fund charitable causes as the Lord God directs me. Then 10-20% to purchase investments (stocks, bonds, etc) to help grow my income. The rest is used for living and medical expenses.

lenders.name: Linet
lenders.loan_because: I want to help erradicate poverty. I have thought about it for some time now and could not come up with an efficient way of doing it. Kiva seems to be the answer :-)
lenders.occupational_info: I analyze and interpret a huge amount of data. My findings are used in the implementation of business goals

lenders.name: Rebecca
lenders.loan_because: It's simple: I want to help.
lenders.occupational_info: I provide private tutoring and childcare to young children.

lenders.name: mark
lenders.loan_because: I have visited many third world countries and have seen people with little being so generous of spirt.

lenders.name: charlie
lenders.loan_because: Helping people is a great reward in life.
lenders.occupational_info: I am retired and focus my time helping my children become better people.

lenders.name: Janice
lenders.loan_because: I can.

lenders.name: Kira
lenders.loan_because: A lot can be accomplished a little at a time.
lenders.occupational_info: I teach mathematics to college students.

lenders.name: Chandrasekhar
lenders.loan_because: It is the least I can do.  I appreciate all that I have been blessed with.
lenders.occupational_info: I work with computers, making them useful in wading through the all the information that overwhelms us.

lenders.name: Michael Frazier
lenders.loan_because: It gives me the opportunity to assist others to reach their entrepreneurial goals.
lenders.occupational_info: I help companies and people reach their employment goals.

lenders.name: Kate
lenders.loan_because: It's such an easy way to make a big impact on someone elses life. Pay it forward!

lenders.name: Boris
lenders.loan_because: In a few hours an American earns as much as a family in another country in a week! Giving them an opportunity to do better is a good thing. It is by small steps from everyone that the world can improve.
lenders.occupational_info:
I give 50% of my pre-tax income to the most cost-effective charity I can find; currently it's Against Malaria Foundation (read about it on GiveWell.org).

Join me and others in doing the most good we can: GivingWhatWeCan.org

lenders.name: Wings
lenders.loan_because: I believe that one person CAN make a difference.
lenders.occupational_info: I work diligently to 'make a difference' for my employer's varied entities in every possible way.

lenders.name: Phoebe & Chloe
lenders.loan_because: It can make the world a better place.
lenders.occupational_info: We are in 7th and 5th grade.

lenders.name: Pat + Ted
lenders.loan_because: We know how important it is to have some capital to build a business, and hope many people can succeed in building their businesses.
lenders.occupational_info: We work/worked for a factory that made safety boots - boots that protect your feet from heavy objects falling on them, or nails from piercing the soles.

lenders.name: Kathey & Dale Austin
lenders.loan_because: I like seeing how others use the money to help themselves!

lenders.name: Glenn
lenders.loan_because: It just works.

lenders.name: Omar
lenders.loan_because: I wanted to support entrepreneurs in poor countries to become self sufficient.

lenders.name: Kathleen
lenders.loan_because: I had the opportunity to see first hand how microfinance loans  while working in Ghana.  I believe the loans give people opportunities they may not have had before.  I believe Kiva brings it one more step further by connecting people to people.
lenders.occupational_info: Early Literacy program

lenders.name: Dan
lenders.loan_because: What a fantastic enterprise! It is very fulfilling to know that you are helping someone in need in a meaningful way. By periodically adding more money, as well as reinvesting previous funds, my contribution continually expands.

lenders.name: David & Megan
lenders.loan_because: It works!
lenders.occupational_info: Orphan Care

lenders.name: Micayla
lenders.loan_because: I want to pay my good fortune forward.

lenders.name: Damian
lenders.loan_because: I believe in providing people the opportunity to succeed.
lenders.occupational_info: Planning large information technology projects

lenders.name: Giuseppe
lenders.loan_because: I leaved for 18 years in west Africa and I have directly seen how life is there ...
lenders.occupational_info: Top clients customer service supervisor in automotive industry

lenders.name: Anne & Nathan
lenders.loan_because: I believe I have to be the change I want to see in the world!!!
lenders.occupational_info: Touching hearts and minds

lenders.name: Michael
lenders.loan_because: I was moved inside when I learned about Kiva on a recent PBS program.  What a great idea by the Kiva founders!  Loaning money is the easy part.
lenders.occupational_info: I am an applications engineer for a semiconductor manufacturer.  Lots of high tech stuff in my life.  Kiva is a high tech solution to many low tech problems.  I believe it is highly effective.

lenders.name: Robin
lenders.loan_because: I want to empower other women to have financial control over their lives.

lenders.name: Jacqueline Lapham
lenders.loan_because: People sometimes need a helping hand.
lenders.occupational_info: I am a retired Postmaster with two grown children and three grandchildren.

lenders.name: Ken
lenders.loan_because: by doing so I can help someone find strength and dignity and that they in turn will make their community a better place.
lenders.occupational_info: I raise money for the University of St. Michael's College in Toronto, Ontario, Canada.

lenders.name: Michelle
lenders.loan_because: I can make a difference, person by person.  Thanks, Kiva!
lenders.occupational_info: I teach art and photography to high school students.

lenders.name: Steven
lenders.loan_because: As an entrepreneur myself I understand how challenging it can be to get started. I've been fortunate to have help along the way and like to pass my good fortune on.
lenders.occupational_info: I am a business consultant and help businesses in Canada grow and improve their businesses.

lenders.name: Lily
lenders.loan_because: My grandmother gave me this gift to teach me how to help individuals change the world bit by bit.

lenders.name: Krista
lenders.loan_because: I think everyone can make a difference -- no matter how big or how small.

lenders.name: carla
lenders.loan_because: If you keep re-loaning the money, it magnifies your ability to help.  I have magnified my initial donation 10 fold.  Kiva helps me magnify the imapact I can have on women around the world.

lenders.name: Abram Franc Mark
Adewole
lenders.loan_because: I need loan so purchase locally fabricated machines, which the youth in my community can use in the recycling of waste and the project will be tagged waste to wealth for the youth in my community
lenders.occupational_info: Youth and women will go out there to collect waste polythene and recycle them since polythene is a non degederable waste

lenders.name: Merideth
lenders.loan_because: I love to help thoes in need!

lenders.name: Carol
lenders.loan_because: I want to be a helping hand
lenders.occupational_info: I used to work with birds, in publishing books and building museums

lenders.name: Eberle
lenders.loan_because: ...I can make a small difference in a stranger's life.

lenders.name: Dennis
lenders.loan_because: People have helped me in big ways by loaning me money, so I'd like to give a little bit back by lending to others.
lenders.occupational_info: I own a small computer software company.

lenders.name: Sarah
lenders.loan_because: We're all in this together.
lenders.occupational_info: I study the intersection of society and technology, specifically technology use in crisis and disaster situations.

lenders.name: Judy
lenders.occupational_info: I work with young children who are having difficulty learning to read.

lenders.name: Cookngobble
lenders.loan_because: Everybody can use some help, from time to time.

lenders.name: Steve
lenders.loan_because: Would love to do more for the less privileged but determined people across the world as I have experienced both sides.
lenders.occupational_info: I help solve everyday problems.

lenders.name: Marilyn
lenders.loan_because: I can therefore I should

lenders.name: Russell
lenders.loan_because: Every little helps!
lenders.occupational_info: I prepare art before it goes to print

lenders.name: Jacqueline
lenders.loan_because:
To assist and affect countries positively is a wonderful opportunity and a great dream for me professionally.  A dream that helps me come to a realization and open my sights to the sensitive world in which we live.
There is so much need on various levels. Being apart of this movement (KIVA), both economically and culturally is an invaluable experience that I will further utilize in my own business practices.
lenders.occupational_info: Challenging, continuously learning, building and exciting.

lenders.name: Cammy and Grandpa
lenders.loan_because: Grandpa and I think it is a very good idea.

lenders.name: Diane
lenders.loan_because: I feel that it is important to payforward the gifts received in this world.  My life has been blessed with health, family and friends and I want to share those blessings with those in need.
lenders.occupational_info: I am an assistant to an attorney in a law firm that specializes in creditors rights and real estate

lenders.name: Christie
lenders.loan_because: Our family donated to charities instead of buying Christmas presents this year.  Our daughter gave me a Kiva gift certificate.

lenders.name: Mike
lenders.loan_because: This Loan was a gift from a friend... what a great idea, Thank you Kathy

lenders.name: Laura&Sean
lenders.loan_because: Everyone deserves a chance.
lenders.occupational_info: Wer are both public school teachers.
